Articles.Content:
So this isn't something that aggravated me, but last night I was loading up KSP 0.25 with RSS, Ro, etc., and in the title screen there was this weird glitch that I though I would mention. Take a look for yourself at the images. By the way, this was my first time loading this up with ATM.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://imgur.com/a/fThpJ

Edited December 18, 2014 by Konstantine the Great

Not a bug. It's an Easter Egg included with blizzy's Toolbar mod.

Closing this as there are already quite a few threads on the subject.
